You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesI I] > &iquest

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&iquest;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00bf/index.htm U+000BF].
  * `&iquest` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00bf/index.htm U+000BF].
